label: Autoimmune Diseases
description: Diseases caused by the immune system attacking the body's own cells and tissues.
intents: Find alternative treatments for autoimmune diseases.
Learn about symptoms and diagnosis of autoimmune diseases.
Connect with support groups for autoimmune diseases.
Find doctors and specialists for autoimmune diseases.
Understand the causes and risk factors of autoimmune diseases.

subcategories.label: Lupus
subcategories.description: A chronic autoimmune disease that can damage any part of the body.

subcategories.label: Polymyalgia Rheumatica
subcategories.description: An inflammatory disorder that causes muscle pain and stiffness.

subcategories.label: Sjogren's Syndrome
subcategories.description: An autoimmune disorder that affects the body's moisture-producing glands.

subcategories.label: Vasculitis
subcategories.description: Inflammation of the blood vessels that can cause damage to organs and tissues.

subcategories.label: Raynaud's Syndrome
subcategories.description: A condition that causes the blood vessels in the fingers and toes to narrow, reducing blood flow.

subcategories.label: Autoimmune Hepatitis
subcategories.description: A disease in which the immune system attacks the liver, causing inflammation and damage.
subtopics: Types of rheumatoid arthritis polymyalgia rheumatica

subcategories.label: Psoriatic Arthritis
subcategories.description: A type of arthritis that affects some people with psoriasis.

subcategories.label: Sarcoidosis
subcategories.description: A disease that causes inflammation in different parts of the body.

subcategories.label: Rheumatoid Arthritis
subcategories.description: A chronic inflammatory disorder that can affect more than just the joints.
